name: conspire
actor_no_arg: You wink conspiratorily, waiting for the countersign.
others_no_arg: $n winks conspiratorily, waiting for the countersign.
actor_found_target: You induct $S into your private conspiracy with a wink.
others_found: $n winks conspiratorily at $N.  You wonder what this can mean.
target_found: $n inducts you into $m private conspiracy with a wink.
others_auto: $n is paranoid enough to distrust even $mself.
